00022 RLAlg::RLAlg(Controller* controller, Simulator* simulator, double discount, double stepSize) {
00023 
00024     this->controller = controller;
00025     this->simulator = simulator;
00026     this->stepSize = stepSize;
00027 
00028     useAutoBaseline = false;
00029 
00030     saveName = NULL;
00031     doSaves = false;
00032     epochsBetweenStepUpdates=0;
00033 
00034     controller->setDiscount(discount);
00035     controller->setStepSize(stepSize);
00036 
00037     assert(simulator->getRewardDim() != 0);
00038     baseline.resize(simulator->getRewardDim());
00039     resetLearning();
00040 
00041     // Initialise the observation class for all possible learners.
00042     // They can reinitialise if they like, but this should always be right I think.
00043     obs.init(simulator->getObsRows(),simulator->getObsCols(),simulator->getAgents(), simulator->getNumActions());
00044 
00045 }

00048 void RLAlg::resetLearning() {
00049 
00050     baseline.clear();
00051     controller->resetTrace();
00052     controller->resetParams();
00053     obs.setSteps(0);
00054 
00055 }

00101 double RLAlg::learn(int stepsPerEpoch, int maxTime, int ms, double maxVal) {
00102 
00103     this->maxSteps = ms;
00104     this->maxTime = maxTime;
00105     this->maxVal = maxVal;
00106 
00107     int totalSteps = 0;
00108     int secs = 0;
00109     int epoch = 0;
00110     double lastEpochVal;
00111     double lastStepCheckVal;
00112     double bestEpochVal;
00113     Vector totalRewards(simulator->getRewardDim());
00114 
00115     totalRewards.clear();
00116 
00117     time_t startTime=time(NULL);
00118 
00119     bestEpochVal = lastEpochVal = doSteps(totalRewards, stepsPerEpoch, false);
00120     lastStepCheckVal = bestEpochVal;
00121     // Record time so far.
00122     secs = time(NULL) - startTime;
00123     printPerformanceInfo(true, 0, lastEpochVal, controller->getMaxParam(), secs);
00124 
00125     // Just do this once at the beginning.
00126     controller->resetTrace();
00127     
00128     while (true) {
00129         
00130         // Halting conditions.
00131         if (testForHalt(secs, totalSteps, lastEpochVal)) break;
00132         
00133         // Do one learning iteration over stepsPerEpoch
00134         lastEpochVal = learnCore(stepsPerEpoch, totalSteps);
00135                 
00136         
00137         // Record time so far.
00138         secs = time(NULL) - startTime;
00139         
00140         // Save params if better than before
00141         if (lastEpochVal > bestEpochVal) {
00142             bestEpochVal = lastEpochVal;
00143             if (doSaves) write(saveName);
00144         }
00145         
00146         printPerformanceInfo(false, 
00147                              totalSteps, 
00148                              lastEpochVal, 
00149                              controller->getMaxParam(), 
00150                              secs);
00151 
00152         if (epochsBetweenStepUpdates > 0 && epoch%epochsBetweenStepUpdates==0) {
00153             checkStepSize(lastEpochVal, bestEpochVal, lastStepCheckVal);
00154             lastStepCheckVal = lastEpochVal;
00155         }
00156 
00157         epoch++;
00158 
00159         // Tao add ....
00160         Vector values;
00161         values.resize(2); // The number of actions
00162         ThreeState *ts = (ThreeState *) simulator;
00163         LSPIController *lspic = (LSPIController *) controller;
00164         cout<<"QVals: "<<totalSteps;
00165         for (int i = 0; i < STATES; i++) {
00166                 ts->getObservation(obs, i);
00167                 lspic->doApprox(obs, values);
00168                 cout<<" "<<values[0]<<" "<<values[1];
00169         }
00170         cout<<endl;
00171     }
00172 
00173     return lastEpochVal;
00174     
00175 }

00186 bool RLAlg::testForHalt(time_t secs, int steps, double val) {
00187 
00188         // Halting conditions
00189         if (maxTime && secs >= maxTime) return true;
00190         if (maxSteps && steps >= maxSteps) return true;
00191         if (maxVal && val >= maxVal) return true;
00192         return false;
00193 }

00202 double RLAlg::learnCore(int stepsPerEpoch, int& totalSteps) {
00203 
00204     double lastEpochVal;
00205     Vector totalRewards(simulator->getRewardDim());
00206     totalRewards.clear();
00207 
00208     // Learn
00209     lastEpochVal = doSteps(totalRewards, stepsPerEpoch, true);
00210     totalSteps += stepsPerEpoch;
00211     if (useAutoBaseline) {
00212         baseline.assign(totalRewards);
00213     }
00214 
00215     return lastEpochVal;
00216 
00217 }

00236 void RLAlg::write(char* fname) {
00237 
00238     ofstream o(fname);
00239     if (o.is_open()) {
00240         controller->write(o);
00241         o.close();
00242     }
00243     else cout<<"!! Failed to open "<<fname<<" for write\n";
00244 
00245 }

00254 void RLAlg::read(char* fname) {
00255 
00256     ifstream o(fname);
00257     if (o.is_open()) {
00258         controller->read(o);
00259         o.close();
00260     }
00261     else {
00262         cout<<"!! Failed to open "<<fname<<" for read\n";
00263         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00264     }
00265 }

00279 void RLAlg::checkStepSize(double curr, double best, double last) {
00280 
00281     // We should only be doing this if user requested auto
00282     // step size updates
00283     assert(epochsBetweenStepUpdates > 0); 
00284 
00285     if (curr < best/(1.0 + threshold)) {
00286         // We've gotten substantially worse. Panic!
00287         stepSize/=decreaseFactor;
00288         controller->setStepSize(stepSize);
00289         cout<<"Policy getting worse. Step size decreased to "<<stepSize;
00290         if (saveName != NULL) {
00291             // Load the last best parameters if they are around
00292             read(saveName);
00293             cout<<" and best parameters restored";
00294         }
00295         cout<<endl;
00296         return;
00297     }
00298     
00299     
00300     if (curr < last*(1.0 + threshold)) {
00301         // We're learning too slowly. Speed up.
00302         stepSize*=increaseFactor;
00303         controller->setStepSize(stepSize);
00304         cout<<"Policy improving too slowly. Step size increased to "<<stepSize<<endl;
00305         return;
00306     }
00307         
00308 
00309 }
00310 
00315 void RLAlg::restoreBestParameters(){
00316     if (saveName != NULL) {
00317         read(saveName);
00318         cout<<"Best parameters restored";
00319     }
00320     else
00321         cout<<"No best parameters to restore !";
00322     cout<<endl;
00323     return;
00324 }

00344 double RLAlg::evaluate(Vector&totalRewards, int steps) {
00345 
00346     Observation obs(simulator->getObsRows(),simulator->getObsCols(),
00347                     simulator->getAgents(), simulator->getNumActions());
00348     Vector action(simulator->getActionDim());
00349     Vector rewards(simulator->getRewardDim());
00350     
00351     totalRewards.clear();
00352 
00353     for (int s = 0; s < steps; s++) {
00354         simulator->getObservation(obs);
00355         // Must do next line before calling getAction() since
00356         // getAction will accumulate log action gradients into the
00357         // trace directly for efficiency.
00358         controller->getMostProbAction(obs, action);
00359         simulator->doAction(action); 
00360         simulator->getReward(rewards);
00361         totalRewards += rewards;
00362     }
00363 
00364     totalRewards /= steps;
00365 
00366     return norm_1(totalRewards)/simulator->getRewardDim();
00367 
00368 }
00369 
00370 
00375 double RLAlg::evaluateAndPrint(int stepsPerEpoch, int maxSteps) {
00376 
00377     double val;
00378     Vector totalRewards(simulator->getRewardDim());
00379 
00380     totalRewards.clear();
00381 
00382     time_t startTime=time(NULL);
00383 
00384     //cout<<setprecision(PRECISION);
00385   
00386      val = evaluate(totalRewards, stepsPerEpoch);
00387      //printPerformanceInfo(true, 0, 0, 0, 0);  
00388       printPerformanceInfo(true, 0, val, controller->getMaxParam(), time(NULL) - startTime);  
00389     int totalSteps = stepsPerEpoch;
00390     while(!(maxSteps && totalSteps >= maxSteps)) {
00391         val = evaluate(totalRewards, stepsPerEpoch);
00392         printPerformanceInfo(false, totalSteps, val, controller->getMaxParam(), time(NULL) - startTime);  
00393         totalSteps += stepsPerEpoch;
00394       }
00395       return val;
00396 }
